comment.author: 48577769@N07
comment._content: I visited Lisdoonvarna a couple of years ago. Isn't that where they have the matchmaking festivals?  As we walked down the street, there were various groups of women and men on their own. I know a group of women were making eyes at my hubby! LOL

comment.author: 30369211@N00
comment._content: Twin Wells is marked on the OS 25" map. You can make out this bit of pavement beside the river in the Bing maps aerial view
